recipe_name: Carrot and herb salad with Parma ham
author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the carrots, herbs and oil into a bowl. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well. To serve, place the Parma ham flat onto a plate and arrange the carrot and herb salad on top.
ingredients: 150g/5Â½oz carrot, finely sliced ,  1 tsp chopped fresh parsley,  1 tsp chopped fresh chives,  1 tbsp olive oil,  50g/2oz Parma ham,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
